channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump doubles planned tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum to 50% as trade war intensifies
item.description: President Donald Trump says he will double his planned tariffs on steel and aluminum from 25% to 50% for Canada, escalating a trade war with the United States’ northern neighbor and showing an indifference to recent stock market turmoil and rising recession risks.

item.title: Trump warns that arrest of Palestinian activist at Columbia will be ‘first of many’
What is known about the deadly January air crash between a passenger jet and US Army helicopter
